title: Baobei Nuer Hao Mama
synopsis: Chen Weilin (voiced by Sun Jinhua) has been a small section chief of a state-owned enterprise for more than 20 years. Although he has been working hard to get a promotion, he still seems to be unable to seize the opportunity. Wu Xianhui (voiced by Deng Yuting) is a typical housewife, hot with big waves, likes playing mahjong and watching TV dramas. She is happy all day long and seems to have no trouble. 　　 These two people with very different personalities became husband and wife by coincidence. They also gave birth to two lovely daughters, Chen Dadi (voiced by Zu Qing) and Chen Xiaodi (played by Liang Ying). Chen Dadi's personality is like a mother. He is an eccentric spirit advocating freedom, often indulged in fantasy, and will feel a little discouraged when he wakes up. Chen Xiaodi is like a father, with a kind heart under the appearance of being smart. A happy family, trusting and supporting each other, they form a "home" and they are indispensable.(translated from douban)

Sequel.name: Baobei Nuer Hao Mama Zhi Kuaile De Jiating
